title: Holliday (leg) expects to return on road trip
content: Matt Holliday (quad) expects to be activated at some point on the Cardinals' current road trip. That lengthy road trip starts Thursday night in Cincinnati and ends next Sunday at Wrigley Field. Holliday began jogging late last week and is scheduled to run the bases on Friday at Great American Ball Park. That should be the final step in his rehab. He's played in just 11 games since June 8 because of a torn right quadriceps. Sep 10 - 3
